job_description: Student Counsellor : Eduproof Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Eduproof Student Counsellor Application Deadline : 17 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 3 Age: 22 to 30 years Location: Dhaka (Uttara Sector 11) Salary: Tk. 15000 - 20000 (Monthly) Published: 07 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 22 to 30 years Responsibilities & Context Counsel students and parents on overseas education opportunities based on academic background, career goals, and financial capacity Provide accurate information about universities, colleges, courses, entry requirements, tuition fees, scholarships, and intake timelines Assess student eligibility and recommend suitable study destinations (e.g., Australia, UK, USA, Canada, Europe, Malaysia) Guide students through the entire admission process, including course selection, application submission, and follow-ups with institutions Assist students in preparing required documents such as SOPs, CVs, academic transcripts, recommendation letters, and financial documents Advise students on visa requirements, Genuine Student (GS/GTE) statements, interview preparation, and compliance with immigration rules Coordinate with university representatives, partner institutions, and admissions teams to track application progress Maintain accurate student records, application status, and CRM updates Support students with offer letter acceptance, fee payment guidance, and enrollment confirmation Provide pre-departure briefings covering accommodation, travel, insurance, part-time work rules, and cultural adjustment Ensure ethical counselling practices and compliance with institutional and immigration policies Achieve individual and team recruitment targets while maintaining high student satisfaction Participate in education fairs, seminars, school visits, and marketing events Stay updated on changes in visa regulations, university policies, and international education trends Skills & Expertise Canva Pro Computer Literacy Digital Marketing (Social Media Marketing) MS Office Suggested by Education Counseling Immigration Consultant Student Counseling Visa Processing Compensation & Other Benefits Mobile bill,Performance bonus,Profit share Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka (Uttara Sector 11) Company Information Eduproof Follow Address: House 30, Sonargaon Janapath Road, Sector 11, Uttara Website: https://eduproof.io/ Business: Study Abroad guide and visa Full Stack Software Developer : Preneur Lab Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List Preneur Lab Full Stack Software Developer Application Deadline : 20 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Company Information Summary Vacancy: -- Age: 22 to 30 years Location: Dhaka Salary: Tk. 25000 - 35000 (Monthly) Published: 10 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 22 to 30 years Responsibilities & Context Company Overview Preneur Lab Digital is a leading software development company specializing in web, AI, ERP, office management and interactive web applications. We work with local enterprises and international clients across the UK and Canada, delivering reliable, scalable and user focused digital products. Role Overview We are looking for a Full Stack Software Developer to join our core development team in our Dhaka office. Key Responsibilities Design, develop, and maintain front-end interfaces Build and maintain back-end applications and RESTful APIs Integrate front-end applications with back-end services securely and efficiently Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and security Write clean, reusable, and well-documented code Debug, troubleshoot, and resolve technical issues Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science & Engineering or a related field Strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Solid experience with React.js Back-end development experience using PHP, Python, Node.js Experience with RESTful APIs, JSON, and API integrations Understanding of authentication and authorization (JWT, OAuth, Laravel Sanctum) Experience with databases such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB Familiarity with Git, version control workflows, and deployment basics Strong understanding of responsive design principles Good communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team Details Employment Type: Full-time Experience: 1–3 years Vacancy: 2 Work Hours: Saturday – Thursday, 10:30 AM – 6:30 PM (WFH on Saturday) Work Modality: On-site (Dhanmondi 4/A, Dhaka, Bangladesh) Learn more: www.pl.digital Skills & Expertise HTML & CSS PHP Python JavaScript Node.js JSON RESTful API MySQL Employment Status Full Time Job Location Dhaka Company Information Preneur Lab Follow Address: Flat - 4/B, House - 13/B, Road -4/A, Dhanmondi, Dhaka - 1209 Website: https://www.preneurlab.com.bd Report this Job / Company (রিপোর্ট) রিপোর্ট এই চাকরির জন্য বিজ্ঞাপনদাতা ব্যাক্তি/প্রতিষ্ঠান আপনার কাছ থেকে কোন অর্থ চাইলে কিংবা নিয়োগ প্রক্রিয়া চলাকালীন কোন প্রকার হয়রানিমূলক (শারীরিক/মানসিক) আচরণ করলে অতিসত্ত্বর আমাদেরকে জানান অথবা জবটি রিপোর্ট করুন। চাকরি পাওয়ার জন্য কোন ব্যাক্তি/প্রতিষ্ঠানকে অর্থ প্রদান করবেন না। চাকরিকালীন কোন প্রকার হয়রানির (শারীরিক/মানসিক) সম্ভাবনা থাকলে সেখানে জয়েন করবেন না। কোন প্রকার অর্থ লেনদেন বা নিয়োগদাতা কর্তৃক হয়রানির দায়িত্ব বিডিজবস বহন
